name: Environmental Art by Kasia FZ-LLC
profile_description: The Environmental Art will teach and create Environmental Art and the associated science and philosophies and will be a bridge between art and science through education.  We will create Art which will enhance the environment, whilst making a statement on ecological conservation and cityscape issues. Our creations can be used within Modern architecture as an effective tool to transform concrete jungles into greenspace by blending the borders between indoor and outdoor living, thus improving the quality of living within the cities, office and homes in which it is applied. The work of the environmental artists working in the academy will embrace ideas from philosophy and environmental psychology whilst also considering scientific factors including but not limited to:engineering, horticulture and dendrology
